entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:19 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 12:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -21.6°C
Wind: WNW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount possibly more than 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon then increasing to 50 gusting to 80. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
